doc.field: Series III: Conductor Scores and Orchestrations
Series III: Conductor Scores and Orchestrations

This series consists of piano conductor scores, master scores and parts, and full orchestrations for Broadway and off-Broadway productions. The bulk of the collection consists of bound and handwritten "green-books" and spiral-bound piano conductor scores. This series also comprises production scores for several theater personalities, including cabaret singer Marti Stevens (b.1933) and librettist and lyricist Dorothy Fields (1905-1974). Also included in this series are full orchestrations for Mandy Patinkin's stage productions of his albums Kidults and Mama-Loshn.
